com.redhat.rhn.common.db.datasource

Class CachedStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.common.db.datasource.CachedStatement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CachedStatement
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A cached set of query/elaborator strings and the parameterMap hash maps.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      static int BATCH_SIZE
      The size above which queries are split into multiple queries, each of this size.

      • modifyQuery

        public void modifyQuery(java.lang.String replaceToken,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> valueList,
                        QuerySanitizer querySanitizer)
        Modify the sql statement by replacing the specified token with the specified list of String values.
        Parameters:
        replaceToken - The text in the sql statement to be replaced.
        valueList - The list of String values to be quoted and concatenated together in a comma-separated list that replaces the replaceToken.
        querySanitizer - An optional sanitizer used to check each value.

      • restartQuery

        public DataResult<?> restartQuery()
        Restart the latest query
        Returns:
        what the previous query returned or null.
